DOC.brief_summary: The current trial compare protective effect ticagrelor prasugrel microvascular dysfunction patient revascularized ST elevation myocardial infarction .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing Micro Vascular Dysfunction Acute Myocardial Infarction Ticagrelor
DOC.detailed_description: Coronary microvascular dysfunction highly prevalent revascularized ST-elevation myocardial infarction important prognostic implication . Current data suggest ticagrelor might superior prasugrel reduction coronary microvasculature dysfunction . Thus , design clinical trial compare microvascular function revascularized ST-elevation myocardial infarction patient treatment steady state ticagrelor prasugrel . Coronary microvascular dysfunction assess index microcirculatory resistance primary percutaneous coronary intervention 1 month follow-up infarct-related vessel non-infarct related vessel .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . Patients present STelevation myocardial infarction < 12 hour symptom onset 3 . Successful percutaneous coronary intervention infarctrelated vessel modern drugeluting stent 4 . Intermediate stenosis noninfarctrelated vessel ( 5090 % ) 1. history myocardial infarction 2 . Participation another clinical study investigational product precede 30 day 3. history cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) 'transient ischaemic attack ' ( TIA ) 4 . History intracranial haemorrhage 5. indication use oral anticoagulant therapy ( i.e . acenocoumarol ) 6. severe liver dysfunction ( ChildPugh score 1015 ) 7. congestive heart failure 8. cardiogenic shock 9. leave ventricular ejection fraction < 35 % 10. bleeding diathesis 11. age â‰¥ 75 < 18 12. body weight < 60 kg 13. gout 14. coagulation disorder 15. severe pulmonary disease 16. pregnancy breast feed 17. limited life expectancy 18. platelet count < 100 000/mm3 19. history drug addiction alcohol abuse past 2 year 20. need chronic nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug 21. creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min dialysis 22. chronic total occlusion ( CTO ) 23 . Left main disease 24. allergy contraindication ticagrelor prasugrel 25 . Contraindication adenosine 26 . Patients unable follow onsite 27 . Unable undergo contraindication MRI 28 . Contraindication drugeluting stent 29 . Inability obtain informed consent 30 . Coronary artery bypass graft medical history
